name: Hoops (itch) (Captain Nakou)
description:
Hoops - Escape the loop

Welcome to my Ludum Dare 47 Jam entry as a solo dev.

My LD47 link if you want to vote or something

Just a simple game, inspired by Super Hexagon (apparently, I never played it but yeah, it looks a lot like it. I even wonder if it's not directly a clone of something else, simple as it is).

It's just an arcade game where you try to have the highest score by going out of infinites hoops that are coming at ya faster and faster.

Hope you'll enjoy it. It was really hard to concentrate with my neighbor having a big party over my head, my roof menacing to fall and kill me every time a new song started. That's also the reason I am not taking this project beyond what it is. I am tired and angry and I need some rest this weekend.

Cheer.
